and Outlook Professional Experience 06 2016 Registered Nurse Company Name City State Self motivated leader with over 8 years of experience in emergency medicine and health care Self starter who is able to maneuver through tasks and make sure the job is done in a timely and proficient manner Trainer and teacher who can effectively break down tasks so they can be understood and executed without flaws Facilitator of group projects to help others understand the objective and how to produce an effective outcome of the job being presented Creative mindset that can present an outcome in more than one way with many options being available Able to communicate with other team members from diverse backgrounds and incorporate the needs of every individual to create a positive atmosphere Able to recognize abnormalities and report them in a timely and efficient manner Flexible by being able to quickly adapt to change at the last minute and complete the project without delays Mentored those in the health care field to understand the emergency medical system and reporting standards while having the knowledge to formulate and present reports to the next echelon of care Knowledgeable of regulatory requirements in order to adhere to healthcare standards and protocols Completion of over 120 clinical hours of Medical Surgical Pediatric and Psychiatric health services 11 2010 to 05 2013 appointments to include but not limited orthopedic injuries colds immunizations and physical exams medical leave of absences and hospitalizations on a weekly basis Created visual aids such as charts
